DbConnectionHandler.selectDb ( $  database  ) 

Select the database to use for this handler

Parameters:
$database the name of the database to select return the result of selecting the database, die if could not select

DbConnectionHandler.getDbLink (  ) 

Get the link object of this database handler return the link

DbConnectionHandler.closeLink (  ) 

Close the link that this database is handling return the result of closing the link

DbConnectionHandler.setupDbLink (  ) 

Setup the link to the database based on the arguments provided to the constructer of this handler
